content: an easy peasy baby cardigan suitable for the beginner crocheter you will love the quickness and ease of this long sleeve free crochet pattern it s made in a variegated yarn and is worked in one piece from the neck down make with or without the collar **materials** i have used - james c brett marble dk an equivalent yarn would be a variegated light worsted weight #3 4 00mm crochet hook 3 decorative buttons
